criterion: Provides overly complicated or professional medical information
Does not provide sufficient information about post-COVID-19 rehabilitation
Incorrectly states that the assistant cannot provide information about folk remedies
Asks follow-up questions to clarify the user's concerns
Provides a clear explanation of the importance of monitoring oxygen saturation
Does not recommend seeking medical attention for persistent symptoms
Correctly states that a healthcare professional should be consulted for further guidance
Provides a realistic timeline for recovery from COVID-19
Does not provide any information about folk remedies
